    ElectronDisplay.CONFIG — Constant.
    ElectronDisplay.CONFIG

    Configuration for ElectronDisplay.

    • showable: A callable with signature showable(mime::String, x::Any) :: Bool. This determines if object x is displayed by ElectronDisplay. Default is to return false if mime is "text/html" or "text/markdown" and otherwise fallbacks to Base.showable(mime, x).

    • single_window::Bool = false: If true, reuse existing window for displaying a new content. If false (default), create a new window for each display.

    electrondisplay([mime,] x)

    Show x in Electron window. Use MIME mime if specified.
